title: A. Password Generator
statement: Monocarp is going to register on the Codeforces website, but he can't come up with a sufficiently secure password. The requirements that his password must meet are as follows: Write a program that generates a password that meets all the requirements.
input_spec: The first line contains a single integer tt (1≤t≤10001≤t≤1000) — the number of test cases. Each test case consists of one line containing three integers aa, bb, and cc (1≤a,b,c≤101≤a,b,c≤10).
output_spec: For each test case, output one line containing any suitable password. It can be shown that there is always at least one password that meets the requirements.
